channel.title: Redemption 317
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=Red][B]Reply, or remove.[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
Download: [URL=http://up.ht/OoTtt0]Redemption.zip[/URL]
[B]Features[/B]
[ul][*] Spirit shield effects. [*] All spell books work. [*] Auto server messages. [*] Setlevel in skilltab. [*] Useful commands. [*] Improved combat system. [*] All known dupes fixed. [*] 508 mapback with draining orbs. [*] Robgob's alert system. [*] Correct animations/stances for all chaotic weapons. [*] Custom crowns. [*] Kill/death ratio. [*] Player killing w/ pk point dupes. [*] Cleaned edgeville bank. [*] Rocktail work. [*] Much more... [I]the server needs a few bugs fixed, pre-warning.[/I][/ul]
[B]Media[/B] [IMG]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/5298/5038d7b4ffe04ebc909eaa3.png[/img] [IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4195/aaa7a580ff36430b95afdce.png[/img] [IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/5306/57d9718235954d5ba3f144d.png[/img] [IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/6515/826bcc59b7144a2d8c01e29.png[/img] [IMG]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/9212/7c430c4c0a5e4a2884c517d.png[/img] [IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/3429/40953e795a80481cabd1a3a.png[/img] [IMG]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/1968/2375e9c2960047089f0f4cb.png[/img] [IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/1494/775ea8636adf4e85936590a.png[/img] [IMG]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/9653/84c6a65d16584758a0de0a7.png[/img] [IMG]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/6223/d3da9bca21c34a038a94a4b.png[/img]
[SIZE=6][COLOR=Red][B]I give permission to release on other sites, but ONLY if I get 100% credits. You take NONE.[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]

item.title: Redemption 317
item.dc:creator: @Chuckee Chuckee
item.description:
@Chuckee wrote:

[quote=“Hostpro, post:43, topic:450215”]It won’t seem to let me set my stats, any help please?

I click the stat just like it says but nothing happens.[/quote]
Click any combat skill on the skilltab and it’ll ask you what level you’d like to set it, 1-99.

item.title: Redemption 317
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:34, topic:450215”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=553113.msg4056862#msg4056862 date=1343060013]

After carefully looking at the base, I have found that some work has been done, but not enough to be significant. A lot of content in the server isn’t very good, not complete, very buggy…

You cannot say that as you do not know what the base for his server is?

The base for his server is PI, that is quite obvious, I apologize if your too ignorant to figure that out.
Let me rephrase what I said up above, the “source” is very incomplete/not working;
The log out button on the client doesn’t even work.

Wtf? Obviously its a pi but you do not specifically know which Pi?! I cannot believe you just said its a pi, well naw captain obvious?! Thats like saying private servers are based of runescape, you had the cheek to call me ignorant after that statement l0l.
I haven’t even looked at the source, I just know your previous statement was completely retarded as YOU DO NOT KNOW WHAT BASE HE IS USING. You know the base he is using is based of pi but that is not the base. Moron.
[/quote]
No matter what you say it’s still a PI. No matter who fucked it up after him, the BASE is still Project Insanity.
Saying he based it off PI, is like saying he created his own base, using PI as a reference, which is completely wrong. Saying this base isn’t PI is like saying you weren’t a mistake, its just not true.[/quote]
Dear god, I’m not going to debate with a retard. Whatever you say dumbo(y)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Chuckee wrote:

Bellend:

[quote]I give permission to release on other sites, but ONLY if I get 100% credits. You take NONE.

Ohh really? i dont see how you did 100% of this?
#1 Runescape base was by jagex
#2 the private server base was by another guy even if it was clean…
#3 you moved a few shops, added some customs, nothing major

so how do you get 10% let alone 100%?[/quote]
Giving credits to JaGeX and the private server base is pathetic. Everyone knows they get credits, no need to mention it. Stop complaining.
